name: Dangerous Down the Hill
description:
This game was developed for GMTK Jam 2020!

The theme for the game jam is Out of control and was developed in 48h.

Dangerous Down the Hill consists of a simple gameplay, where you go down the mountain running away from a giant snowball while avoid of falling at any moment

How to play:
  • Click on the screen to change the direction, each click will make you change direction, so be careful
  • When you pick up the bomb, click on it to reduce the size of the snowball

Ps: use the mouse click or touch the smartphone
